text: Standard Liège (full name: Royal Standard Club de Liège) is a football club from Liège in Belgium. The club is playing in the Belgian Pro League, the top level in Belgium. *Champion (10):1958, 1961, 1963, 1969, 1970, 1971, 1982, 1983, 2008, 2009 *Cup (6):1954, 1966, 1967, 1981, 1993, 2011 *European Cup Winner Cup: **Runner-up 1982 ==Team== Category:1900 establishments in Europe Category:Belgian football clubs Category:Liège Category:19th-century establishments in Belgium
title: Standard Liège
